link:labelLink.link:label: Financial Position 1

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of other assets classified as current in accordance with relevant accounting standards, as required in DRF_300_0.
Assets Current Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of total other assets classified as current in accordance with relevant accounting standards, as required in DRF_300_0.
Assets Current Total Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of other assets classified as non-current in accordance with relevant accounting standards, as required in DRF_300_0.
Assets Non Current Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of total other assets classified as non-current in accordance with relevant accounting standards, as required in DRF_300_0.
Assets Non Current Total Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it has been used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of reserves other than those classified as asset revaluation reserves. This item has been measured and disclosed according to accounting principles.
Equity Reserves Other Than Asset Revaluation Amount
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of prior year adjustments, increase (decrease), to retained earnings as determined in accordance with relevant accounting standards.
Equity Retained Earnings Prior Year Adjustments Amount
This is the value, for the relevant period, that has been transferred to (from) retained profits from (to) reserves, as determined in accordance with relevant accounting standards
Equity Transfers To From Retained Profits From To Reserves Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of borrowings other than finance leases classified as current in accordance with relevant accounting standards.
Borrowings are generally amounts of money on loan from financial institutions or other creditors with the promise or understanding that it will be repaid.
Liabilities Current Borrowings Not Finance Lease Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of other current liabilities as requested on DRF_300_0.
Liabilities Current Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of total other current liabilities as requested on DRF_300_0.
Liabilities Current Total Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of borrowings other than finance leases classified as non-current in accordance with relevant accounting standards.
Borrowings are generally amounts of money on loan from financial institutions or other creditors with the promise or understanding that it will be repaid.
Liabilities Non Current Borrowings Not Finance Lease Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of other non-current liabilities as requested on DRF_300_0.
Liabilities Non Current Other DRF300 Amount

This is a balancing item in the list in which it is being used.
This is the value, as at the relevant date, of total other non-current liabilities as requested on DRF_300_0.
Liabilities Non Current Total Other DRF300 Amount
